content: make a bobble stitch into the chain 2 space chain 2 skip 2 stitches repeat until the chain 2 meets the first bobble stitch join the second chain with the first bobble in this round with slip_stitch to close the circle repeat round 2 above 13 more rounds or until the desired height to finish chain 1 and single_crochet into all stitches and join the last single_crochet with the first with a slip_stitch repeat this finish round 2-3 times more string at the end of the final round of the body slip_stitch to move the last stitch to the desired location of the string 2 dried squid knits & crafts row 1 from the location make 1 single_crochet then make ⭑double chain stitches per tutorial below for approximately 38 long or a desired number for preferred length considering the stretch ★ tutorial for double chain string crochet for knitters - double chain stitch in determining the length consider how you will wear the bottle on the shoulder or cross-body and also how heavy your bottle is going to be when it is full taking care to not twist the string single_crochet into the opposite side of the bag body to secure the string row 2 turn the work single_crochet 1 into the top loop on one side of the double chain string all the way to the beginning of the string single_crochet into the body of the bag to secure the string finishing repeat row 2 once or twice more for the desired width of the string 3
